title: Minneapolis Businesses Lock Doors as ICE Raids Spark Fear Among Immigrant Families
description:
Minneapolis businesses become locked aid hubs for immigrants fearing ICE "Operation Metro Surge" (2K agents since Jan 6). Signs read "No Federal Agents Permitted"; doors locked, knock-only entry amid daily raids. Wed Jan 21: protesters confront Border Patrol Cmdr Greg Bovino at gas station ("Title Eight enforcement"). Mayor Frey calls raids "unconstitutional," targeting Latinos/Somalis; schools closed, thousands protest hotels/churches. Community tracks ICE via cars/whistles.


 #MinneapolisICE #OperationMetroSurge #NoFederalAgents #ImmigrantAid #PowWowGrounds #ICEProtests #TwinCitiesRaids #JacobFrey #TitleEight #MNResistance #CommunityDefense #DeportationFear
